mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_NAME , FILE_SIZE , FILE_CREATE_DATE , FILE_UPDATE_DATE , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_EXTENSION FROM TB_FILE
SELECT * FROM (SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_NAME , FILE_SIZE , FILE_CREATE_DATE , FILE_UPDATE_DATE , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_EXTENSION FROM TB_FILE ORDER BY FILE_CREATE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_ID , FILE_NAME , FILE_SIZE , FILE_CREATE_DATE , FILE_UPDATE_DATE , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_EXTENSION) VALUES ( #{fileId} , #{fileName} , #{fileSize} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{fileContent} , #{fileExtension})
